subSections.title: Kanji
Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=にょ
|kanon=じょ<ぢよ
|kanyoon=にょう
|kun=おんな-<をんな-, め-
|nanori=こ, た, たか, つき, な, よし
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=k|おんな|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
Idioms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|女になる|おんな に なる}}
* {{ja-r|女を上げる|おんな を あげる}}

subSections.title: Proverbs
Etymology 2
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|おみな|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK|acc2=1|acc2_ref=NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|おみな|hhira=をみな}}

# {{given name|female|lang=ja|A=a|nodot=1|sort=おみな}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|め|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* {{s|wife}} {{ja-l|妻}}
* {{s|female}} {{ja-l|雌}}, {{ja-l|牝}}

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: Used more in compounds than on its own.

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 4
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|おうな|hhira=をうな}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic}} a [[young]] [[woman]]

subSections.title: Etymology 5
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|おな|hhira=をな}}

# {{lb|ja|obsolete}} a [[young]] [[woman]]

subSections.title: Etymology 6
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|おなあ|hhira=をなあ}}

# {{lb|ja|obsolete}} a [[young]] [[woman]]

subSections.title: Etymology 7
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|じょ|hhira=ぢよ}}

# a [[woman]], ''especially'' an [[actress]] or a [[prostitute]]

subSections.title: Proper noun
Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|suffix|じょ|hhira=ぢよ}}

# {{lb|ja|historical}} ''suffixed to names of female figures in the {{w|Edo period}}''
